verification.text: Indacoini nimel toimuvate pettuste vältimiseks saate kontrollida, kas kanal on ametlik kanal või mitte. Sealhulgas Twitter, Telegram, LinkedIn.
verification.modalTrueText: {{value}}, mille kohta küsisite, on Indacoini ametlik kanal
verification.subTitle: Palun veenduge, et külastate
verification.modalFalseText:
The <0>{{value}} mille kohta küsisite, <1>EI OLE Indacoini ametlik kanal. Palun pöörake tähelepanu oma varadele ja kaitske oma isikuandmeid

Saate sisu kontrollida ja uuesti päringu teha.

menu.titleMain: Ostke oma esimene krüptoraha see on lihtne
menu.titleMainUndo: Seda tõendab üle 10 miljoni ostu kuus
menu.card1: Hoiate seda passiivse tulu saamiseks oma portfellist
menu.card2: Kauplete sellega aktsiatest suurema spekulatiivse kasumi nimel
menu.card3: Teete makse nii, nagu tegemist oleks pangahoiusega, kuid kõrgema määraga
menu.card4: Teete kiireid ülemaailmseid ülekandeid ja maksate veebipõhiselt ilma lisatasudeta
menu.card9: Teie raha ja andmed on kaitstud meie tehisintellektil põhineva turbesüsteemiga
menu.footer2: Aadress: Poordi 3- 63, Tallinn, Eesti, 10156, tegevusluba: FVT000145
menu.reviews1: Protsess oli sujuv ja kiire Protsess oli sujuv ja kiire. Pidin läbima KYC protsessi ja pean ütlema, et see oli üks lihtsamaid KYC-sid, mida ma kunagi näinud olen. Lõpuks võttis kontrollimine umbes 5 minutit ja siis sain kohe oma mündid kätte. Täiesti soovitan
menu.reviews2: Kam marrë monedha relativisht shpejt, duhet të pranoj se përditësimet automatike mbi statusin e transaksionit në TG ishin shumë të dobishme. Vlerësoni përpjekjet, shpresoj se së shpejti do të shtojnë më shumë monedha të rralla
menu.reviews3: Mul oli väga meeldiv kogemus. Mul oli kontrollimisega probleeme, tugi oli väga viisakas ja abivalmis. Nii peaksid kõik krüptoteenused toimima!
menu.reviews4_title: Proovisin seda teenust ja olin väga rahul...
menu.reviews4: Proovisin seda teenust ja olin selle üle väga rahul. Kahjuks esines väike viivitus, kuid kui võtsin ühendust toega, lahendasid nad probleemi ja hüvitasid viivituse. See tähendab midagi. Proovin seda uuesti, kui pean krüpto alla laadima!

faqSection.questionHowToBuy: HOW TO BUY {{currLongName}} INSTANTLY WITH CREDIT CARD OR DEBIT CARD ON INDACOIN?
faqSection.answerHowToBuy:
1st Step: In our order form with {{currLongName}} calculator select the cryptocurrency;
2nd Step: input the amount to be charged from your card in EUR, USD etc.;
3rd Step: input {{currLongName}} wallet address (or leave blank if you want to deposit to Indacoin wallet). You can also enter the address of a person you want {{currLongName}}(s) to be sent to or create a wallet on Indacoin.
Indacoin free wallet presents the opportunity to store dozens of cryptocurrencies.
4rth Step: Fill in the required fields (email, mobile phone number, card details) and once your card is charged our support team will be in contact with you to verify your purchase.
faqSection.answerHowFastTransaction: After you buy {{currShortName}} with credit card or debit card {{currLongName}} transactions take about 15-20 minutes to complete.
faqSection.answerWhereCanStore: You can set up a separate wallet for each cryptocurrency on your PC or you can use our free wallet service and store dozens cryptocurrencies all in one place.
faqSection.questionWhatMinimumMaximum: WHAT ARE THE MINIMUM AND MAXIMUM {{currLongName}} PURCHASES?
faqSection.answerWhatMinimumMaximum: You will have the limit of maximum $200 for the first transaction, additional $200 for the second transaction available after 4 days of the initial purchase, $500 after 7 days and $2000 in 14 days of the first buy. In a month from your first purchase there are no limits when paying with your card. Please keep in mind that the minimum limit is always $50.
faqSection.questionSignupCreate: DO I NEED TO SIGN UP/CREATE AN ACCOUNT TO BUY HERE?
faqSection.answerSignupCreate: No, you just need to enter here Buy {{currLongName}} amount of USD, EUR etc. you want to spend, email, mobile phone number, card details and {{currLongName}} wallet address. Then you will be forwarded to your order page.
faqSection.questionHowToBuyOnline: HOW TO BUY {{currLongName}}(S) ONLINE USING APP?
faqSection.answerHowToBuyOnline: Download the app and safely buy and store not only {{currShortName}} but more than 700 other cryptocurrencies.
faqSection.questionWhatAfterBuying: WHAT TO DO AFTER BUYING {{currLongName}} WITH DEBIT CARD?
faqSection.answerWhatAfterBuying: You can store or hold, send, spend, buy goods and services, donate.
faqSection.questionWhatDoYouWork: WHAT COUNTRIES DO YOU WORK WITH?

generalQuestions.title: ÜLDISED KÜSIMUSED
generalQuestions.answer1:
Oleme alates 2014. aastast krüptoraha valdkonnas tegutsev ettevõte, mis asub Suurbritannias Londonis. Meie teenusega saate osta krediit-/deebetkaardimaksega üle 100 erineva krüptovaluuta ilma registreerimiseta. Samuti saate Indacoinis hõlpsasti ostetud krüpto salvestada, krüptomünte vahetada ja need mis tahes välisesse rahakotti välja võtta, kui see ühildub teie valitud valuutaga.
Meie ärimudel ühendab B2C ja B2B segmendid, võimaldades paljutõotavate kaartide töötlemist münte ja toimib täieõigusliku fiat-to-crypto lüüsina. Kui olete huvitatud oma äri laiendamisest meiega, külastage seda <1>lehte.
Indacoinil on ka oma <3>lojaalsusprogramm, mis võimaldab teil osta krüpto 0,00% tasud ja raha tagasi iga ostu eest. Selle programmi põhielement on INDA märk – Indacoini ökosüsteemi algne märk. See mitte ainult ei toidab lojaalsus- ja suunamissüsteeme, vaid ühendab ka Indacoini IndaFiga – kõik-ühes DeFi platvormiga iga rahalise vajaduse jaoks. Hetkel lansseerisime ametlikult IndaFi põhimooduli - IndaSwap, mis võimaldab kõigil osta DeFi tokeneid otse Visa ja Mastercardiga.
generalQuestions.answer2: You can contact our support team by e-mail (support@indacoin.com), phone (+44-207-048-2582), Telegram (@Indacoin_support) or by using a live chat option on our <1>webpage</1>.
generalQuestions.question3: DO YOU HAVE AN AFFILIATE PROGRAM?
generalQuestions.answer3:
Yes, we are happy to provide our services to different types of business. You can find more details about our affiliate program <1>here.
If you want to list a coin on our platform, please, check <3>this page.
generalQuestions.question4: WHICH CRYPTOCURRENCIES CAN I BUY HERE?
generalQuestions.answer4:
You can buy over 100 different cryptocurrencies that are all listed on our website.
To make an order you can use our website <1>https://indacoin.com or app. Just enter the amount in the calculator and choose one of the available crypto coins. Then you will be able to enter your email, mobile phone number, card details and crypto wallet address where you want your coins to be deposited. At this stage you will be asked to verify your identity to confirm the payment.
generalQuestions.question5: CAN I SELL MY CRYPTOCURRENCY ON INDACOIN?
generalQuestions.answer5: No, unfortunately, it isn’t possible to exchange cryptocurrency to fiat on Indacoin. However, you can exchange coins to other cryptocurrency or withdraw to a platform that allows exchange to fiat.
generalQuestions.question6: CAN I DEPOSIT COINS TO INDACOIN WALLET?
generalQuestions.answer6: Unfortunately, Indacoin doesn’t support deposit option from external wallets to Indacoin. You may deposit coins to Indacoin wallet via purchase only.
generalQuestions.answer7: Unfortunately, at the moment we do not operate in the following countries:  Afghanistan, American Samoa, Albania, Algeria, The Bahamas, Bangladesh, Barbados, Bolivia, Botswana, Cambodia, China, Colombia, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ecuador, Egypt, Eritrea, Gambia, Ghana, Guinea-Bissau, Guyana, Iran, Iraq, Ivory Coast, Jamaica, Laos, Lesotho, Liberia, Mali, Mauritius, Mongolia, Morocco, Myanmar, Namibia, Nepal, Nicaragua, Niger, Nigeria, North Korea, Pakistan, Panama, Papua New Guinea, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Tanzania, Trinidad and Tobago, Uganda, Vanuatu, Yemen, Zambia, Zimbabwe.We are constantly improving our platform and believe that one day our service will be available everywhere.

cryptoCurrency.title: CRYPTOCURRENCY
cryptoCurrency.answer1:
Сryptocurrency (or “crypto”) is a digital currency that can be used to buy goods and services or for trading.
Crypto uses cryptography for security that makes it difficult to counterfeit. Also, cryptocurrency is not issued by any central authority, rendering it theoretically immune to government interference or manipulation.
cryptoCurrency.answer2:
Blockchain is a database that collects information about cryptocurrency transactions together in groups, also known as blocks.
New blocks are always stored linearly and chronologically and can not be removed from the database that is why transactions registered in blockchain can not be changed or declined.
cryptoCurrency.answer3: Each block in the blockchain contains its hash, along with the hash of the block before it, as well as the time stamp. Hash codes are created by a math function that turns digital information into a string of numbers and letters. All crypto transactions can be tracked in blockchain explorers with help of the hash.
cryptoCurrency.answer4: Altcoins are cryptocurrencies other than Bitcoin.
cryptoCurrency.answer5:
You can set up a separate wallet for each cryptocurrency on your PC or you can register a personal account on Indacoin and store 100+ cryptocurrencies in it.
Please, DYOR (do your own research) and pick the wallet provider you like the most. For instance, a few trusted wallets are MetaMask, TrustWallet, and Ledger, but we insist on carefully checking the platform you’re going to use to store your coins. You can use the information in the open sources and consult with the community members of the coins you chose or in our group in Telegram.
We kindly ask you not to hold your altcoins on Indacoin for a long time and withdraw them to a separate wallet specified for this exact cryptocurrency on your PC.
Cryptocurrency purchase is a high-risk operation. It is necessary to analyze all possible risks associated with the market volatility. Indacoin is not responsible for sharp fluctuations in cryptocurrency, its fall in value, impairment and delistment.
cryptoCurrency.question6: WHAT DO YOU MEAN BY BITCOIN OR CRYPTO WALLET ADDRESS?
cryptoCurrency.answer6:
It is the address that helps to identify your crypto wallet in the blockchain and looks like a combination of digits and letters. You can enter the address of the crypto wallet registered on the other platform or <1>create an account on Indacoin.
Usually, a crypto wallet address is displayed in the portfolio section of the account. You can also contact your crypto wallet provider to check the address of your wallet.
Please, be very careful while entering the crypto wallet address. Your crypto coins can be lost if the address is entered incorrectly.
cryptoCurrency.question7: WHAT IS THE VALID CRYPTO WALLET ADDRESS?
cryptoCurrency.answer7: Every cryptocurrency has its own special format of the crypto wallet address that can be used for this currency. A valid crypto wallet address is an address of the wallet compatible with the cryptocurrency you chose (for example, ERC-20 wallet for ETH or BEP-20 wallet for USDC), you can check the name of the protocol for each currency in the open sources. If you see the error notification saying that you’ve entered an invalid wallet address, please double-check if you copied the wallet address correctly and if it matches the coin you picked (for instance, on our platform only ERC-20 USDT is available, so please don’t use TRC-20 or Omni wallets). You can also contact our support team for quick assistance.
cryptoCurrency.answer8:
A destination Tag/Memo is an additional address feature necessary for identifying a transaction recipient beyond a wallet address. The Tag/Memo is mandatory for transactions for cryptocurrencies that use this technology.
Usually, crypto wallets for XRP, XLM, EOS, ATOM coins have tag/memo.
Crypto coins won’t reach your account if the tag/memo of your crypto wallet is not added or incorrect.
cryptoCurrency.question9: FORGOT TO ADD A MEMO/TAG, WHAT TO DO?
cryptoCurrency.answer9: Please contact the support team of your wallet to check whether it’s possible to identify your transaction within their system. From our side, we’re always glad to help you prove that it’s your transaction and form a request to the support team for your wallet. Unfortunately, there is a big chance that your wallet provider won’t be able to recover your coins, so please double-check the details when you’re making a crypto purchase.
cryptoCurrency.question10: HOW FAST IS THE CRYPTOCURRENCY TRANSACTION?
cryptoCurrency.answer10:
Cryptocurrency transaction time depends on which cryptocurrency you are sending.
For example, bitcoin transactions take about 15-20 minutes to complete and on average allow up to 1 hour for the rest of the coins. The exact time depends on how soon the transaction is registered and approved in the blockchain network.

account.title: ACCOUNT
account.question1: DO I NEED TO SIGN UP/ CREATE AN ACCOUNT TO BUY HERE?
account.answer1: No, having an account on Indacoin is not mandatory to buy crypto coins. To make a purchase you just need to enter in the calculator on the page <1>https://indacoin.com</1> amount of fiat money you want to spend, email, mobile phone number, card details and crypto wallet address. Then you will be forwarded to your order page.
account.question2: HOW TO REGISTER ON THE INDACOIN WEBSITE?
account.answer2:
Please enter your email address on this <1>page and follow the instructions in the confirmation email from us.
If the email is not in your Inbox, please, check Bin and Spam folders.
account.question3: I MADE AN ORDER ON INDACOIN. DO I HAVE AN ACCOUNT ON YOUR PLATFORM NOW?
account.answer3:
Registration is not mandatory to buy crypto on Indacoin, that is why the order can be processed without creating an account.
To register the account on our website, please, open this <1>page or use our app.
account.question4: WHY I CAN NOT LOG INTO THE ACCOUNT IN THE INDACOIN APP? I ALREADY REGISTERED AN ACCOUNT ON THE INDACOIN WEBSITE.
account.answer4: Unfortunately, the account on the website and account in the Indacoin app are different accounts with different wallets that cannot be combined. Please, register a separate account in the Indacoin app or <1>log into</1> the account on the website.
account.question5: I DO NOT REMEMBER MY PASSWORD. WHAT SHOULD I DO?
account.answer5:
In this case, you can recover access to your account by resetting the password on this <1>page. You will be able to set up a new password following the instructions mentioned in the email received from us.
After the password is reset the withdrawals from the account will be blocked for 24 hours due to security reasons.
account.question6: WHAT IS THE MINIMUM FOR THE WITHDRAWAL?
account.answer6: The minimum for withdrawal depends on cryptocurrency and is usually equivalent to 0.0007 BTC plus blockchain network commission.
account.question7: WHAT IS THE MINIMUM FOR THE EXCHANGE?
account.answer7: The minimum for the exchange depends on cryptocurrency and usually equivalent to 10 USD.
account.question8: THE ALTCOIN FROM THE BALANCE OF MY ACCOUNT IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE. WHAT HAPPENED?
account.answer8:
Unfortunately, altcoins are not stable and can be delisted from trading platforms for different reasons. If the altcoin is no longer available on main trading platforms we have to block these coins from transactions. In this case, your coins will be stored on the balance of the account until the coin is available again.
We kindly ask you not to hold your altcoins on Indacoin for a long time and withdraw them to a separate wallet specified for this exact cryptocurrency on your PC.
Please, do your own research and pick the wallet provider you like the most. You can use the information in the open sources and consult with the community members of the coins you chose.
Cryptocurrency purchase is a high-risk operation. It is necessary to analyze all possible risks associated with the market volatility. Indacoin is not responsible for sharp fluctuations in cryptocurrency, its fall in value, impairment and delistment.

indacoinVerification.title: INDACOIN VERIFICATION
indacoinVerification.question1: WHAT SHOULD I DO TO VERIFY MY CARD?
indacoinVerification.answer1:
To complete verification you’ll need to enter the 4 digit code you receive via phone call.
For your second step, you will be asked to undergo photo verification, which requires you to upload a photo of your passport/ID, take a selfie on the verification page.
Also, you may be asked to provide proof of residential address.
indacoinVerification.question2: WHAT DOCUMENTS CAN BE USED FOR RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS VERIFICATION?
indacoinVerification.answer2:
To verify your residential address you can use a utility bill, bank statement, credit card statement, tax invoices or other government issued residential statements/certificates.
Please note that we cannot accept screenshots, mobile phone bills, medical bills, purchase receipts or insurance statements.
Proof of Address must be issued within the last 3 months.
If your ID document contains your home address information, it can be used as Proof of Address.
indacoinVerification.question3: I HAVE MADE AN ORDER AND ENTERED ALL THE DETAILS, WHY IS IT STILL PROCESSING?
indacoinVerification.answer3: If you have waited more than 2 minutes, then the order didn't make it to a transaction. It's possible that your card isn't 3D secure and you may need to try again. Make sure you confirm your purchase via PIN code with your bank or you can try buying with a different currency (EUR/USD). Otherwise, if you are certain your card is 3Ds and changing currency doesn't help then you need to contact your bank, they may be blocking your purchase attempts.
indacoinVerification.question4: DO I NEED TO GO THROUGH VERIFICATION EVERY TIME I MAKE A PURCHASE?
indacoinVerification.answer4: You only need to verify your card once and all following transactions will be automatic. However, we will require verification if you decide to use another bank card.
indacoinVerification.question5: WHY DO I NEED TO VERIFY MY BANKING CARD OR SEND A VIDEO?
indacoinVerification.answer5: The verification process protects you in case of card theft, hacking or fraudsters; this works the opposite way in case someone is trying to place a purchase using someone else's banking card.
indacoinVerification.question6: HOW CAN I TRUST THAT MY DETAILS AND CARD INFO ARE SECURE?
indacoinVerification.answer6: We never share your personal information with any Third Parties without your consent and collect only the information required to make sure that you're the card's owner. Our verification process is fully GDPR compliant, you can check the detailed information here: <1>https://sumsub.com/security-compliance</1>
indacoinVerification.question7: I CAN NOT COMPLETE MY KYC VERIFICATION. CAN I DO IT LATER?
indacoinVerification.answer7: If KYC verification is not completed in 2 hours we cancel the order and the pre-authorisation on your card. You will be able to pass verification while your new order is pending. You can also notify our agent via live-chat to prolong the pending order.
indacoinVerification.question8: I CAN NOT COMPLETE MY KYC VERIFICATION. WILL I RECEIVE A REFUND?
indacoinVerification.answer8: If KYC verification is not completed in 2 hours we cancel the temporary pre-authorisation that was placed on your card when you first made your order. In this case, funds return to your bank account shortly, usually within 3 business days, the exact time depends on the bank. Otherwise, please contact the bank and they'll be able to see pending declined transaction and remove the hold status from your funds. If you require assistance with verification, please contact our support team via live-chat and they will walk you through the process.

commissions.title: COMMISSIONS
commissions.answer1: Our fee varies from purchase to purchase as it is based on numerous factors, that's why we have created a calculator that will tell you the approximate amount of cryptocurrency you will receive, all fees included.
commissions.question2: HOW MUCH WILL I BE CHARGED FOR THE TRANSACTION?
commissions.answer2: You will be charged only the amount you specify during your order in our calculator. All fees are included in that amount.
commissions.answer3: Indacoin also has its own <1>loyalty program</1>, which allows you to buy crypto with 0.00% fees and get cashback on every purchase you make. The key element of this program is the INDA token - a native token of the Indacoin ecosystem. It not only fuels the loyalty and referral systems but also connects Indacoin to IndaFi - an all-in-one aggregator for every financial need. At the moment we officially launched the core module of IndaFi - IndaSwap, which allows everyone to buy DeFi tokens directly with Visa and Mastercard.

purchase.title: PURCHASE
purchase.question1: HOW TO BUY CRYPTOCURRENCY ON INDACOIN?
purchase.answer1: Make sure you are using your own, 3D secure Visa or MasterCard bank card and have a driver's license, ID or passport available in case we require verification. Then please open this <1>page</1> and select in the calculator the cryptocurrency you want to buy, input the amount to be charged from your card in fiat and input the crypto address (or leave blank if you want to deposit to Indacoin wallet). Fill in the required fields and once your card is charged our support team will be in contact with you to verify your purchase.
purchase.question2: HOW FAST WILL MY CRYPTOCURRENCY BE SENT?
purchase.answer2: Usually, it takes about 30-60 minutes after you make an order or complete verification (if it’s the first time you use the card on Indacoin).
purchase.question3: WHAT TYPE OF CARDS ARE ACCEPTED?
purchase.answer3: At the moment we accept only Visa and Mastercard with 3D secure option.
purchase.answer4:
3D Secure technology consists of the programs Verified by Visa and MasterCard SecureCode.
After you enter your credit card details in our online store, a new window will appear, requesting your personal security code. The bank card issuer will authenticate the transaction within seconds, as well as confirm that you are the individual making the purchase.
purchase.answer5: Fiat money is every government-issued currency, like the U.S. dollar, the euro or other global currencies.
purchase.question6: WHAT OTHER PAYMENT SYSTEM CAN I USE TO BUY CRYPTO COINS?
purchase.answer6: Currently, we only accept Visa/Master card payments on our platform.
purchase.question7: MY ORDER WAS DECLINED BY THE BANK, WHAT SHOULD I DO?
purchase.answer7: You need to contact your bank and ask for the reason for the decline, perhaps they can lift the restriction so a purchase can be made. Please, also check if crypto purchases are permitted by your bank and your bank card is 3D secure.
purchase.question8: MY TRANSACTION FAILED. WILL I RECEIVE A REFUND?
purchase.answer8:
If your transaction fails, we cancel the temporary pre-authorisation that was placed on your card when you first made your order.
In this case, funds should have returned to your bank account shortly, usually within 3 business days, the exact time depends on the bank. Otherwise please contact the bank they'll be able to see pending declined transaction and remove the hold status from your funds.
purchase.question9: I RECEIVED FEWER COINS THAN WAS PROMISED. WHY?
purchase.answer9:
We process the exchange according to the current market rate at the moment when KYC verification is completed and the order is approved. We are trying to make every transaction as profitable as possible for you but the amount that the user receives may differ from originally shown due to sharp jumps in rate.
In case, if the amount differs by more than 25 per cent, the user has the right to ask for a refund by providing a request via support@indacoin.com
purchase.question10: I’VE BEEN CHARGED TWICE. WILL YOU REFUND ME?
purchase.answer10:
It is extremely unlikely we have accidentally charged you twice for the same order, so first, please check to see if you have placed two orders instead of one.
If this is not the case, please provide an official bank statement where it is specified that the transaction was authorised by Indacoin (not a screenshot of the SMS) via support@indacoin.com and our finance department will investigate the case and provide you with any possible assistance.
purchase.question11: I DIDN’T MAKE AN ORDER ON INDACOIN BUT MY CARD WAS CHARGED. WHAT SHOULD I DO?
purchase.answer11:
If your card was stolen and used for the purchase on our platform by another person, please, block your bank card and contact our agent immediately via live-chat support or e-mail <1>support@indacoin.com for assistance.
We kindly ask you to contact us no later than 3 days from the date of purchase, so that immediate action is taken on our side and if possible - a refund.
